title: No Scoped Type Hierarchy on Binary Projects
OB: The scoped type hierarchy feature is not working as expected on binary projects.
EB: I expect that when I hit F4 on a binary project selection, it should display a scoped type hierarchy, just like it does for other types of projects.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open a binary project in the software.
2. Select the binary project in the project explorer.
3. Press the F4 key.
